StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: NHLBI TOPMed: The Cleveland Family Study

Person.Organization: BRIGHAM AND WOMEN'S HOSPITALCASE WESTERN RESERVE UNIVERSITY
UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS AT CHICAGOUNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO

Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
The TOPMed acknowledgement statement can be found at: https://topmed.nhlbi.nih.gov/acknowledgements.
In addition, please include: "Support for the Cleveland Family Study was provided by NHLBI grant number R01 HL46380 and NHLBI grant number R01 HL113338."
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: There is one consent group for this study: DS-HLBS-IRB-NPU (Disease-Specific Heart, Lung, Blood, and Sleep Disorders, IRB, NPU). Use of the data must be related to Heart, Lung, Blood, and Sleep Disorders. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval (please note only full or expedited approvals will be accepted). Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Data use is limited to academic researchers conducting research in heart, lung, blood and sleep disorders, and their risk factors, and does not include the study of population origins and ancestry. CFS data may not be used to investigate individual pedigree structures, individual participant genotypes, phenotype-only analyses or issues such as non-maternity and non-paternity. All researchers requesting CFS data will be required to obtain approval from their IRB for their proposed project using CFS data (please note only full or expedited approvals will be accepted).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Heart, Lung, Blood, and Sleep Disorders, IRB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-HLBS-IRB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Heart, Lung, Blood, and Sleep Disorders. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
Data use is limited to academic researchers conducting research in heart, lung, blood and sleep disorders, and their risk factors, and does not include the study of population origins and ancestry. CFS data may not be used to investigate individual pedigree structures, individual participant genotypes, phenotype-only analyses or issues such as non-maternity and non-paternity. All researchers requesting CFS data will be required to obtain approval from their IRB for their proposed project using CFS data (please note only full or expedited approvals will be accepted).

ConsentGroup.title: Exchange Area (IRB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: EA-IRB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use by NHLBI WGS study investigators only. There is one consent group for this study: DS-HLBS-IRB-NPU (Disease-Specific Heart, Lung, Blood, and Sleep Disorders, IRB, NPU). Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Data use is limited to academic researchers conducting research in heart, lung, blood and sleep disorders, and their risk factors, and does not include the study of population origins and ancestry. CFS data may not be used to investigate individual pedigree structures, individual participant genotypes, phenotype-only analyses or issues such as non-maternity and non-paternity. All researchers requesting CFS data will be required to obtain approval from their IRB for their proposed project using CFS data (please note only full or expedited approvals will be accepted).
